metadata.Title: CVE-2022-40284 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A buffer overflow was discovered in NTFS-3G before 2022.10.3. Craftedmetadata in an NTFS image can cause code execution. A local attacker canexploit this if the ntfs-3g binary is setuid root. A physically proximateattacker can exploit this if NTFS-3G software is configured to execute uponattachment of an external storage device.

criterions.comment: ntfs-3g: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
